mapper.select: SELECT wid,cname,title,details,start_time,end_time,status,url,submit_number,status FROM homework,course WHERE homework.cid=course.cid AND homework.cid=#{cid}

select homework.wid,cname,homework.title,homework.end_time,status,total_grade,is_read,is_eva,is_appeal,is_submit,is_eva_over from homework,course,sc,stu_homework where homework.cid=#{cid} and sc.sid=#{sid} and homework.cid=sc.cid and sc.cid=course.cid and homework.cid=stu_homework.cid and sc.sid=stu_homework.sid and homework.wid=stu_homework.wid
